title: Fantastic Mr Fox opening credits font
content:
Hello,

I need to identify the font used in the opening credits for Wes Anderson's Mr Fox. Here's a sample. Please help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Fantastic Mr Fox 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013213/http:/typophile.com/files/Fantastic%20Mr%20Fox%201.png) | 1.81 MB |
author: dudleymoorin
